Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the United States Congress to pass and the President of the United States to sign the Restore Honor to Service Members Act, which would upgrade to honorable those discharge classifications received by gay and lesbian service members solely because of their sexual orientation.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Restore Honor to Service Members Act

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the United States Congress to pass and the President of the United States to sign the Restore Honor to Service Members Act, which would upgrade to honorable those discharge classifications received by gay and lesbian service members solely because of their sexual orientation.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Restore Honor to Service Members Act
